Excited to uncover the tech trends of 2024? Join us for a discussion led by Eleanor Warnock, Deputy Editor at Sifted, featuring our panel:

  • Cyan Banister, Angel Investor and Partner at Long Journey Ventures
  • Ida Josefiina, Co-founder and CEO of Sane
  • Heikki Aura, Senior Lead at Sitra Fund

Discover their unique insights into the key tech trends for the upcoming year.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” Get ready to dive into founders’ insights on how to build and scale AI companies. Kia Kokalitcheva, Senior reporter at Axios, will lead us in a discussion with the panelists:

  • Bhavin Shah, Founder & CEO at Moveworks
  • Hovhannes Avoyan, Founder & CEO at Picsart
  • Brett Martin, President at Kumospace & GP at Charge.vc

Explore why these founders chose AI for business and the challenges they overcame while building AI software.
